docs.text: Replica Island Kotlin Conversion ¶ This repo is a case study in the conversion of the Replica Island game to Kotlin Status of the repo: ¶ In development. Kotlin conversion is basically complete. Game testing was continuous during the conversion process. Mkdocs publishing notes ¶ The build_and_upload_docs bash script must be run from the docs directory.
